overview: Animals 2018 Remix - The iconic 1977 Pink Floyd album has been remixed for the first time by James Guthrie. Animals is a concept album, focusing on the social-political conditions of mid-1970s Britain, and was a change from the style of the bandâ€™s earlier work. The album was developed from a collection of unrelated songs into a concept which describes the apparent social and moral decay of society, likening the human condition to that of animals. Inspired by George Orwell's Animal Farm.  Special Blu-Ray gatefold card sleeve  16-page booklet  Audio Mixes:  2018 Remix - Stereo: 24-bit/192kHz Uncompressed, dts-HD MA  2018 Remix - 5.1 Surround: 24-bit/96kHz Uncompressed, dts-HD MA  1977 Original Stereo: 24-bit/192kHz Uncompressed, dts-HD MA
title: Pink Floyd - Animals (2018 Remix)
